body.h: 1. A robot may not injure a human being or, through inaction, allow a human being to come to harm.
body.t: 1. ロボットは人間を傷つけてはいけない，また，傍観することによって，人間を傷つけてはいけない．
body.h: 2. A robot must obey the orders given it by human beings except where such orders would conflict with the First Law.
body.t: 2. ロボットは，その命令が第1条に反しない限り，人間の命令に従わなければならない．
body.h: 3. A robot must protect its own existence as long as such protection does not conflict with the First or Second Law.
body.t: 3. ロボットは，第1条または第2条に反しない限り，自身の存在を守らなくてはいけない．

svoml.footer: Quoted from "I, Robot." by Isaac Asimov.
